creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: 2 large bamboo shoots, one diagonally from UL to LR corners, other behind, on a slight diagonal to opposite corners
markings: 2-character untranslated inscription, in black, at L edge; one seal, in red, below inscription; one seal, in red, at R edge; \'3.\', in pencil, on back of mount at UL corner
title: Bamboo Shoots, from an album of vegetables
